hero.name: Rafael Maghari
hero.title: Fullstack Developer with 11 years of experience
hero.description: Crafting robust and scalable solutions with Laravel, NodeJS, React, Vue.js, Next.js, and DevOps expertise.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: With over a decade of experience in software development, I've had the privilege of working on diverse projects that have shaped my expertise in full-stack development. My journey began with PHP and Laravel, and I've since expanded my skillset to embrace modern JavaScript frameworks and cloud technologies.

I specialize in building scalable web applications, implementing robust backend systems, and creating intuitive user interfaces. My experience includes working with startups, enterprise clients, and everything in between.

I'm passionate about clean code, performance optimization, and staying current with industry best practices. When I'm not coding, I enjoy mentoring other developers and contributing to open-source projects.

projects.title: GiftShark
projects.description: A gifting and donation platform enabling seamless gift-giving experiences. Built with real-time features and comprehensive mailing integrations.

projects.title: DotReady
projects.description: Transportation company monitoring system for tracking driver apprehensions. Features real-time data updates and comprehensive reporting.

projects.title: Whittaker Properties
projects.description: Modern directory site with headless CMS integration for property listings. Built with server-side rendering for optimal SEO performance.

projects.title: SmartScout Calculator
projects.description: Calculator tool for analyzing Amazon's latest low inventory data. Helps sellers make informed decisions about stock management.

projects.title: PandaByte
projects.description: Modern landing page for a software solutions company. Features smooth animations and responsive design.

projects.title: Podiem
projects.description: Comprehensive CRM platform for lead generation with real-time notifications and automated workflows. Part-time DevOps responsibilities included.

projects.title: SugarAndFlour
projects.description: Upwork-like marketplace platform connecting customers with professional bakers. Features campaign management and real-time messaging.

projects.title: Appertiser App
projects.description: Marketplace platform connecting farmers directly with clients. Streamlines the agricultural supply chain.

items.name: John Smith
items.content: Rafael is an exceptional developer who consistently delivers high-quality work. His expertise in both frontend and backend development has been invaluable to our projects.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: Working with Rafael has been a great experience. His technical knowledge, attention to detail, and ability to solve complex problems make him a valuable asset to any team.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.content: Rafael's deep understanding of modern web technologies and best practices has helped us deliver robust and scalable solutions to our clients. Highly recommended!

items.title: Freelance Fullstack Developer
description: GiftShark: Built gifting/donation platform with Laravel, React, Inertia, AWS, Pusher, MailChimp
DotReady: Developed transportation monitoring system with Laravel-Vue, NodeJS
Whittaker Properties: Created directory site with NextJS, Vercel, Sanity.io
SmartScout Calculator: Built Amazon inventory calculator with NextJS, AWS Amplify
PandaByte: Developed software company landing page with NextJS
Podiem: Built CRM for lead generation with Laravel, VueJS, GCP (Part-time DevOps)
SugarAndFlour: Created baker marketplace with Laravel, Vue, AWS
Appertiser App: Developed farmer marketplace with Laravel, Vue

items.title: Full-stack Developer

Built Cash Voucher - Approval System for departmental budgets with Laravel-VueJS
Worked with PHP, Javascript, VueJS, CodeIgniter tech stack
Implemented Laravel Sanctum/Passport, Horizon, Telescope, Flareio
Managed deployments with Gitlab, Gitlab Pipeline, and Docker

items.title: Team Lead
description: Led development of Multi-tenant Ecommerce Site with Laravel-VueJS
Built Event Management System for large venue bookings with Laravel-VueJS, Flutter/Ionic
Managed team using PHP, Javascript, VueJS, Node, Express stack
Implemented Laravel ecosystem: Sanctum/Passport, Horizon, Telescope
Managed infrastructure on Digital Ocean with Gitlab Pipeline and Docker

items.title: Senior Web Developer
description: Developed Tutoring Website - Scheduling System for tutors and students
Built Internal CRM for department management
Worked extensively with Yii framework and Javascript
Collaborated with PHP, Javascript, VueJS, Node, Express tech stack

items.title: Assistant Programmer
description: Developed A.I.M.S - Accounting, Inventory, Monitoring System

Gained foundational experience with Yii framework
Collaborated with senior developers on enterprise solutions
